how to create a documentation request?: Just click 'Documentations' on the sidebar menu and click 'Request new'.
how to create a complaint request?: Just click 'Complaint/Blotter' on the sidebar menu and click 'Create new'.
how to create a blotter request?: Just click 'Complaint/Blotter' on the sidebar menu and click 'Create new'.
how to create a complaint\/blotter reque: Just click 'Complaint/Blotter' on the sidebar menu and click 'Create new'.
how to create a cctv review request?: Just click 'CCTV Reviews' on the sidebar menu and click 'Request new'.
how to file for a documentation request?: Just click 'Documentations' on the sidebar menu and click 'Request new'.
how to file a complaint?: Just click 'Complaint/Blotter' on the sidebar menu and click 'Create new'.
how to file a blotter?: Just click 'Complaint/Blotter' on the sidebar menu and click 'Create new'.
how to file a complaint\/blotter?: Just click 'Complaint/Blotter' on the sidebar menu and click 'Create new'.
how to file a cctv review?: Just click 'CCTV Reviews' on the sidebar menu and click 'Request new'.
